agent1_finding: Major shift from residual to ROYA method; well-documented by Census Bureau
agent2_finding: Significant level shift detected (p=0.003, d=1.56); mean increased by 921 persons
synthesis: Methodology changed AND statistical shift detected, but cannot conclusively attribute shift to methodology vs. Bakken boom timing

agent1_finding: DHS adjustment introduced; 75% humanitarian migrant capture; +700K national revision
agent2_finding: Non-significant level shift (p=0.13) due to COVID confound
synthesis: Methodology changed significantly but statistical test cannot separate from COVID effect

agent1_finding: Explicitly warns against combining vintages for time series analysis
synthesis: Clear institutional guidance against combination, but research context may differ

agent1_finding: Census acknowledges small states face additional accuracy challenges; rate instability
agent2_finding: Very small samples (n=10,10,5) limit power; 29:1 variance ratio
agent3_finding: ND pattern similar to other small states (SD, MT)
synthesis: Small state effects acknowledged by Census and visible in statistical tests, but shared patterns across states suggest real regional effects

agent1_finding: Three distinct methodological eras documented (2000s residual, 2010s ROYA, 2020s ROYA+DHS)
agent2_finding: Variance heterogeneity significant (p=0.002); structural break test non-significant
agent3_finding: Likely comparable (3/4 indicators positive); ND-US correlation unstable but may reflect Bakken boom
synthesis: Mixed evidence - methodology differences are real but may not dominate over genuine demographic shifts

agent1_finding: 40% of DA variance despite 12% of population; most uncertain component
agent3_finding: 93% agreement with ACS foreign-born changes validates general patterns
synthesis: High inherent uncertainty in NIM, but patterns validated by external data

agent3_finding: Coherent response to 2008 crisis and Bakken boom; 380% growth 2010-2015
synthesis: Time series responds appropriately to known events, supporting construct validity

agent2_finding: Proceed with caution; sensitivity analyses needed
synthesis: All three agents recommend caution; extension appears feasible with proper documentation
